title: Bugged notifications for message and icon receiving (EVERY F*CKING LOGGING-IN)
body:
So since one guy sent a message in a club chat, the notification for a new message has been popping out every time I log in. And Since Riot sent out the icons for honors, I've been getting notifications for new items too. 

It's extremely annoying, do you have any idea how to fix it?

replies.body: Yikes that could get seriously annoying for sure. Try running a quick repair through the client options really quick, and let me know if that helps or not.
I even reinstalled the game, it didnt changed anything.
